casebody.data:
HAYDEN vs. HEFFERAN (Admr.), No. 13985, 99 M., 262.

(Certiorari to Kent.)

• To compel respondent to pay interest on a judgment for costs in relator’s favor, on appeal from tbe probate of a will. Tbe Circuit Court denied tbe writ.

Reversed and writ granted March 6, 1894, with costs.

Respondent contended tbat this is not such a judgment as bears interest, and tbat if it is, no interest can be computed previous to tbe date of taxation of the costs.

Held, tbat tbe judgment for costs bears interest from tbe date of its rendition.
